txt.en: 'Hah! That will teach them. The rest should scurry like rats back to the holes from which they crawled!'

'Be on your guard, [placeholder]. I can still smell some goblins lurking nearby. I suspect they are waiting for us to leave, so they can kill Ainhard and steal from what remains of his home. We will show those cowardly vermin what happens to those who cross the Beornings!'
Goblins are still lurking in the forest near Ainhard's home, waiting for an opportunity to steal from him.
Goblin looters can be found stealthily skulking near Ainhard's homestead.\n\nYou should defeat goblin looters.
Langhár can be summoned to your side with Langhár's summoning horn.\n\nYou should talk to Langhár.

'Be on your guard, [placeholder]. I can still smell some goblins lurking nearby. I suspect they are waiting for us to leave, so they can kill Ainhard and steal from what remains of his home. We will show those cowardly vermin what happens to those who cross the Beornings!'
